name: asacoder-landing
description: ASACODER Professional Landing Page - Web Developer, Forex Trainer & Digital Marketing Expert

scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.build:prod: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.optimize: npm run build && npm run compress
scripts.compress: cd frontend/dist && npm install -g gzip-cli && gzip -r .
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../backend && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run security && echo 'Ready for deployment!'

author: Ashuembom Stephen Akembom - ASACODER
